mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_board WHERE bno > 0 ORDER BY parent DESC, seqno ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board (bno, title, content, writer, parent) VALUES (seq_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, seq_board.currval)
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, updateDate = SYSDATE WHERE bno = #{bno}
